localize.text: What? Who are you?
Introduce yourself.
Don’t say anything.
Ah, you’re the new manager?
Sorry, you don’t look like one.
Ah, you’re the manager Tiphereth was talking about?
Do you know the saying, ‘Silence may put a bullet in your head?’
You better watch yourself.
Other departments may kiss your ass even when you walk around with an air of arrogance for being a manager,
but in here, such pompous attitude will become your noose someday.
Well, since you’ve made it here, I guess you won’t be a deadweight, at least.
I am Gebura, head of the Disciplinary Department.
We are the best combat department among the Sephirah, so we don’t need any cowards.
Want to know the types I hate most?
Cry babies who constantly whine about how Abnormalities or employees are piteous and that they don't want to see anyone die.
It’s just like a soldier refusing to kill in the middle of a battlefield.
If you’re not one of those kind, then we can work together, at least.
Why do I hate cowards?
Why do I hate Abnormalities?
Isn’t it obvious? They’re just dead weight.
Let me ask you.
Why does it require an explanation at all?
What are the Abnormalities to you, exactly?
Holy entities? Poor creatures locked underground? Precious beings who produce energy for us?
Wrong.
Abnormalities can be damaged, but never destroyed.
But they can feel pain, at least.
Let's make life as painless as possible.
Well, that was easy, don’t you think?
But sometimes your decision is too soft.
Next time...
Gebura, the suppression plan you sent me, isn’t it too large?
Alright, move on if you said your words.
There was a similar incident before. I’m the head of the Welfare Team, so I should make a note of this.
Yeah, got it, so why don’t you return to your department with that coffee you love?
And part of my department’s E.G.O seems to be malfunctioning. You had nothing to do with it, right? The previous suppression was too quick.
...I will give you compensation for it. But speak further of this, and the E.G.O might be aimed at your head.
Alright, I’ll be on my way. Why is my luck so bad? The companions I have... are either berserk war mongers, or weird twins.
It’s been some time since I came down to the middle levels. Long time no see, Chesed.
Are you here to see Gebura? Say something wrong and you’ll end up with a hole in your head, so be careful!
Is that true, Gebura?
Get lost, Chesed. Hod, what brings you here?
Ah, it’s about the suggestions you made about the Abnormality Escape Training. It needs some adjustments.
Go on.
Well, if we do a direct assault like you suggested, the section here will suffer heavy casualties. If we change the training plan to a more defensive stance here, the rate would be lower.
What do you think?
But, this...
Hm?
Isn’t this too nice to the Abnormalities?
Um, I’m sorry, what do you mean?
... Forget it. Since you’re the Training Team, your opinion is final, right?
It is, but by going with my plans...
Do it.
Thanks, see you later!
Hod!
Huh? What?!
You forgot your report.
Ah, I could have lost it. I thought you were going to shoot me in the head like Chesed said. Thanks!
Hod is too weak.
If I was the head of the Training Team, I would never act like her.
Gebura will return soon.
Manager, if it’s alright, could you relay my words?
Gebura is...
...strangely obsessed with suppression, I would say.
The additional casualties of the employees during the process... it’s entirely disregarded.
Angela knows, but couldn’t care less.
Gebura is good at suppressing Abnormalities,
so some added loss in the process is a trade off.
But as a manager, you know that taking down the Abnormalities is not our only objective.
Well, I’m not sure Gebura will listen to you, but I would appreciate it if you could try.
I saw Chesed leaving, anything I should know about?
Be honest with me, I can see everything.
I’m warning you,
don’t act as if you know everything.
I’ve been here for a long time, and I’ve seen much more than you have.
Experiment subject 09-34, a simple test will be conducted before applying the chemicals.
Gebura, the machine with a soul. A wonderful creation of the Lobotomy Corporation.
What does having a soul mean?
It means having value. It’s actually kind of a religion A believes in. I participated in this experiment because I trust him.
I don’t know if I have a soul. If I am disassembled, will there be a soul inside?
Ah, it can be easily determined by talking with you. A soul can’t be seen, but it can be felt.
I will be reborn while looking at my own soul. Mankind and the world will be changed soon. Trust A, he is the new savior.
So you’re Gebura, I heard a lot about you from Christopher. You have a soul, I’ve heard. 'A' is really remarkable. Don’t pay attention to those who disrespect you, they don’t know your worth.
This is Gilly, our daughter. She is kind and sweet, just like you.
Then, this child also has a soul?
Of course. The soul is something every lifeform holds, the essence of us all, but yet not known to all.
This world believes only in things that can be seen, a bad belief which will eventually lead everyone to destruction.
Angela, is that a monster?
That is called an Abnormality, Gebura.
Is it different from a monster?
Monsters are monstrous creatures from their very existence, but an Abnormality is made from humans.
Then why does that Abnormality have Christopher’s watch and sound like him?
That’s because, an Abnormality is a being that is created from 'them.' It does not come into existence from nothing.
Do Abnormalities devour humans? Did it devour Christopher and is now mimicking him? I don’t understand.
That’s because it is complicated, Gebura.
One thing is certain, it didn’t happen because someone is evil. And that form you call a monster certainly has Christopher’s will in it.
Why is there a step of sending Isabelle to the DI-01 experiment chamber in the experiment history? Why are you placing her with that horrific monster?
I don’t know Gebura, they don’t explain every detail to us. I heard it’s to determine the loss of humanity or something, but I don’t really understand.
It's gonna hurt Isabelle, I'm sure. I should talk to Angela.
Gebura, maybe it would be better to keep quiet about it. I saw other machines questioning orders, but Angela simply reset them.
Please, if you feel anger, try to live with that emotion.
Wouldn’t it be better to live with that than to lose your memory and become lifeless?
How do you think the story would have ended?
What happened to Christopher’s wife and his daughter?
I don’t know either. Not sure it’s good or bad, but it was not my experiment.
I only know that Gilly’s old blanket was the only thing to come out of the chamber.
Most people didn’t even talk to us, because machine's aren't even worth their time or effort.
But they told me I was worthy... they looked past my exterior and saw what was inside me. Something I wasn’t even aware of.
That monster called Abnormality killed lots of people since then.
But it never dies.
It’s unfair.
Why do we have to be nice to them?
Don’t pay any mind to the employees in front of you. When it comes out, that will be the least of your worries.
Since it truly feels pain,
I will dish out as much pain as possible.
That is the only reason I am here.
.... Don’t patronize me again, ever.
Well, I know Lobotomy Corporation is an important client, but don’t they renew their contract too often?
This place is grimy like a dungeon and it always gives me a bad feeling.
Wait a minute, captain. We need to explain this to the manager.
Oh, still don’t know who I am? Then I'll explain it quickly.
.....It must be the first time that you participated in an outside meeting, manager.
As we mentioned a few times prior, my company has been signing with some Wings for sustainable development and business opportunities.
It is also our job to renew the contract with associates of the Wings when the time comes.
We just want you to be a token manager and fill the slot. I will do the rest of the work.
Business associates? What's with that boring introduction?
You can give more detailed information later in private, right now let's start the meeting.
....Why don’t you take off your helmet, at least during the meeting?
What? That is the identity of the Rabbit.
Well, okay, whatever.
So let me just simply explain the contract details from my end.
Well, um,
I'm tired of telling you all of this again... If you read the contract, everything's there. Do I need to say it one more time?
As I said prior, it's a formal procedure.
And I would have to specify again whether if you agree to the contract terms or not.
You haven’t changed a bit.
Let me tell you about our services.
Company R will provide military support and protection from external threats to Company L.
Every branch of Lobotomy will be included under Company L, but there may be some exceptions under certain circumstances.
When I say an exception, I mean like when it relates to something dealing with the head or eyes. Other things will be on most part okay.
Company L will provide energy to Company R for maintenance purposes.
This renewing process will include a prerequisite that calls for a mutual and continual agreement between Company W and Company L.
And... Let me see... L will provide all the armaments used for the killing of Abnormalities.
All Rabbit Team employees will have their memories erased after the completion of their missions.
There will be no questions regarding the functionalities of the facilities or the purpose of this place.
Lastly, as the captain of the Rabbit Team, I will send my team according to R’s guidelines and assume command.
That’s everything. Please read the contract for the rest of the details.
There's no change in the agreement with Company W.
Also, the renewal period will be 1 year, just like before.
Good.
One side note, can change the teleporter for our trip here to something smoother? It feels like my body is being disassembled and leaves all out of sorts.
You are going to have to ask Company W about that. It's out of our control.
Gebura, what’s that look on your face?
Why are the Rabbits even dispatched here?
You really know nothing if you're looking down on the Rabbits!
We have concluded that the Rabbits are the most suitable for the task of slaughtering in this place.
The Rhinos would probably crush the facilities beyond recognition,
and the Reindeer, except for the machines here, would do irreparable damage to the manager over there.
Angela made it very clear not to hurt the manager.
We always listen to our customer’s requests.
I’m not talking about the Rhinos or Deer!
I’m saying that we can handle our own problem, we don’t need any outsiders to interfere.
What? What can YOU do with that tin body, huh?
You look weaker than us now, can’t you see?
If it was you from back in the day then it'll be a different story.
But look at you now. As soon as you go to the back alley, you will be torn apart by those Cleaners.
The time you soaked everything in sight in red mist is now part of the past.
Things are different now. Remember that.
If I wanted to, I could tear a Rabbit like you apart in seconds...
Everyone, please focus on the topic at hand during the meeting.
Gebura, the reason for the Rabbit Team being here is to help prepare for the worst-case scenario that is beyond our abilities.
I'm sure with your previous suppression experiences that you are well aware of this.
The combat skills of mercenaries sent from Company R are on par with that of other Wings.
We can handle our problems on our own!
I can prove it now if you want...
I have the compiled statistics. The amount is too vast for any person to calculate, except for me.
The reason why I continue the contract is that taking the risk of involving outsiders is worth every penny.
However, the Rabbits won’t intervene with the general suppression.
Calm down and analyze the situation reasonably, Gebura.
Well, that’s it for renewing our contract.
Gebura has been in charge of the basic suppression process,
so just ask Gebura for advice or help regarding combat.
Well, I’m sorry that I don’t have any questions for you, Rabbits have our own ways of handling things.
...I don’t have anything left to say to you animals.
You’re done with your business, why don’t you leave now?
You're being harsh to a fellow back alley member.
Are you mad at me because I made fun of you earlier?
You think this is funny? I'm not in the mood for your games, so just shut up.
Ah! I get it.
You’re mad because you think we broke in on your fight.
Yeah, I don't need help from the likes of you.
Well, we don’t have much reason to be here.
We'll come when we’re called and vanish without a trace when the time comes.
I thought you were like me and found joy in slaughter.
But you're just crazy.
Completely wack.
We are Rabbits, we hop around following orders for fresh grass, but you're different.
You used to know who your enemy was.
Do you know how shocked I am? I never expected to see you like... this and in a place like here.
You were my hero once back when you weren't afraid of shedding blood to protect someone. Please don’t taint my memories.
… All Abnormalities have escaped, everyone here is dead…
….Dead? All of them?
I think there won’t be any survivors...
Abnormalities are not something that we can handle only by ourselves.
You must be in danger, too... You better escape now....
Gebura, I will take part in an experiment soon.
We probably will see each other again, but I’m just saying this just in case.
Please take a good care of Gilly and Isabelle while I’m gone.
Can Abnormalities feel normal emotions when they encounter persons concerned?
What choice would they make if they were confronted by a direct situation?
The experimentation on this... the results were as expected.
What should I do with these? There's a blanket and a few feeding bottles left.
I got all the results I wanted from this experiment.
The owners are no more so you can discard them.
Hey....
Hey! Did the power just go out?
I gotta go.
Well, I don’t think our next meeting will be very peaceful.
The Rabbit will leave now.
The hero is definitely not me.
Never.
Everybody might've noticed. We never had this kind of situation before.
Those monsters were supposed to be sleeping but are now woken up by something.
Let’s not focus too much on what caused this.
Let’s solve the problem since the situation dictates us to.
Let me say a few words before we initiate combat today.
We don’t need cowards in my department.
Don't be careless when you face the monsters.
Remember to arm yourself with rage to defeat those monsters.
If you don't agree with my words, you can leave at any time.
I will continually rush the monsters, even if you are torn apart in front of me.
I won't shed a tear or mourn those who vanish without leaving even their name.
If you want your body and soul to be at peace, please put your name on the transfer wait list for the Welfare Team.
There's a reason we very few members in our department. But remember, that also means every last one of you are excellent in what you do.
Over. I'll talk more after sorting out this mess.
(Static)
Gebura your main body has taken too much damage.
Why don’t we stop the suppressing operation here for today?
Tiphereth is investigating the situation, so we should be able to solve the problem soon.
I don’t need it.. I can still fight.
But, with your condition, it’s...
Shut up, I said I can still fight!
31 damaged E.G.Os and 17 dead employees so far,
and five or six parts needing replacement from the main body...
I’m not thrilled looking after a machine who behaves childishly,
but the Sephirahs in the Central Team weren't able to control you and that's why I'm here.
Poor child, look at yourself.
At one time I admired the light in your eyes,
but now they are consumed by madness.
What a shame that both of us are locked in this dungeon now,
but I didn’t break.
We won’t have to risk our lives facing each other like in the past but,
I pity you.
Stare right at the object that makes you angry.
The blade that lost its way can only split the air no matter how sharp it is.
How do you think I feel seeing my once rival looking so pathetic?
Cut, slash, destroy, throttle, and trample...
I sometimes remember the faces who showed me kindness.
If I could taste a small piece of revenge upon the monsters who stole their smiles, happiness, and futures,
my spear and sword will never stop swinging.
People are dying in my blurred vision.
They always get torn apart by the monsters.
Those dying faces differ from time to time.
Some are strangers, some are loved ones, and sometimes they transform into Christopher or Isabelle.
Whoever they were, I am filled with agony.
I look at my paralyzed leg and severed arm, and I curse my weak body and scream with rage,
then I blackout.
I’m so sick of the blackouts...
It’s impossible to fight with such low manpower. I can’t approve your offer.
... Please reconsider...
Why should I approve an operation with such a high chance of failing?
If the manpower strength is too low, I can make up for it. If they’re too weak, I will make up for that, too.
There weren’t any rules about the Sephirahs using E.G.Os.
If that’s what you want to do, then go ahead.
Familiar grip, correct weight, and a practiced pose.
This feeling is so distinct that it pulls me back onto the right path away from wandering just like a road sign.
I completely lose track of time while I wielded my weapon.
It was a little funny to see Tiphereth and Chesed’s bewildered faces after they saw me covered in blood.
I tried my best to stab and break them, but they will recover again someday.
Some wail and others scream.
I also broke and lost some of my parts, but those are soon replaced.
What a perfect little hell, just for me.
Are you looking for your arm?
Here you go.
Just think of it as me being merciful to a fellow warrior as I leave you with one of your arms.
I don't think she knew. What a tragedy she brought here that was caused by her great ideology.
I don’t know if it could've helped, but this happens quite often, way more often than you think.
I mean, a little sprout getting trampled to death is common.
I would say you're quite a lucky survivor.
You even thwarted my plans a little.
I didn’t expect you to kill two Claws, stop the monsters,
and even deal with me.
About the monsters, by the way,
I can’t deny that they were astonishing creatures.
Even after killing a bunch of your friends, they've never gotten soft or tired.
...... I can see you aren’t much different from them.
Okay.
If you can stand on the ground with your own two feet, then come at me.
I won’t break.
If I can’t remove these monsters,
I will destroy the company myself...
So that my aimless wrath can disintegrate and sleep under the ground forever.
Among many fixers in the back alley, she was one of the few who could stand toe to toe with the Head or the Claws.
She was called the ‘Red Mist’ among the people of the back alley.
She earned that name by protecting us from the outside threats.
Michelle's betrayal led the Eye to our hiding place and the Head mercilessly sicced their Claws on us.
Instead of dealing with her directly, the cunning Head unleashed the unstable Abnormalities to eliminate us.
The Abnormalities were out of control, tearing apart our comrades,
as the Claws hunted their prey...
It was beyond her limits, but she gave it everything she had to protect us.
She lost an eye, one of her arms was cut off, and was covered with irreparable scars all over her body.
But she didn’t give up...
And she eventually protected B and myself from death.
Collect the dead body.
Collect the dead body.
Collect the dead body.
The corpse at the time demonstrated the horrendous situation she went through.
She opened her eyes again after a long time had passed,
but her unfocused anger dragged her down deep to the bottom,
so we had to reboot her many times.
Why do you have that look on your face? Do you think I'm a thief or something?
I just didn’t expect to see you here.
Well, to be honest, I knew you would come here eventually, but I didn’t expect to see you so soon.
You had a sour expression at that time, but you actually liked me, didn't you?
What the hell.
You know, I have no idea about the lives of people from the back alley or about their pain.
Maybe I have been living a richer yet cowardly life compared to them.
So I always felt ashamed of everything, even to a small ray of sunlight.
……. It wasn’t hard all the time.
…. I know it must’ve been a hard decision to come here so thank you.
Sooner or later, we will have unexpected troubles here.
There are just too many problems to solve in a peaceful way.
The actual reason I talked to you on that day out of all the other people was about something rather trivial.
…… What was it?
To be honest....
Honest...?
I thought I could barter with you for cheaper prices.
...... I made the wrong choice. I will be going back now.
Hear me out.
I saw you pay for the funeral expenses for an old lady you didn't even know.
I really admired your kindness and I even looked forward to it.
Unburied bodies might cause the infestation of mice all over the back alley,
and I just wanted to repay her for the food she's given me.
Get it? I have never been close to being kind in my entire life.
Why do you keep smiling?!
I am just satisfied with myself for having great discernment in my choice.
She was right. Carmen had a sharp eye for people.
The tale of how she built her reputation could fill a chronical and then some.
But Carmen was too wrapped up with taking care of others that she didn't take good care of herself.
We were so happy together back then, that it is almost cruel to recall those memories.
We were flying towards a limitless world that seemed to never end.
By the way, who’s the guy glaring at me?
That’s A. He just always looks like that.
I beg you, please protect the people here.
I can trust you on this.
From the past to the present, Abnormalities have wandered around the facility and killed numerous people.
Despite my reputation, there are too many things I couldn't save.
My entire life was far from justified.
I wouldn’t have such a strong connection with the back alley if I had just stayed in the Nest.
It was a place where there was no need for justice, morality, or other things like those.
If you never been there before, you wouldn't know about it.
What agony the people there have lived through.
How unfair the lives of the people who lived there must have been.
What I learned was how to survive this miserable existence.
Carmen told me she wouldn't give up on anyone including the people like us.
She also told us that the weak with the willing spirits could also possess enough power to cut heads.
What an absurd and ridiculous story. Why didn't I just keep on going?
I’m not smart enough for these complicated calculations,
I couldn't even write a coherent document.
The only thing I was able to do was to draw my sword against the enemy who was in the way.
I was only about protecting myself to survive,
but on that day, I never felt prouder of myself that I could protect others.
But I wasn't able to protect anyone, which cut me deeply.
I was full of anger which caused me to lose my mind.
In the end, though, I managed to protect someone.
B and I survived.
Okay.
You and the others survived because of me...
I thought I had lost Carmen's will forever,
but after it all, something lead me here, right?
I feel like I can breathe a little now.
We wake up with that moment when our breaths stopped lodged into us like fragments.
Sadly I woke up with only having rage left in my heart against Abnormalities.
You miss her, don’t you?
I do, too.
I don’t think she can ever come back.
I don’t think I can ever see her fearless smile on her face again, which made people like me follow her.
The light that overflowed from her face that you just wanted to hold with both hands.
But my will and promise will always be eternal.
It will be a place where she can live on even after death.
If you also remember then please tell me.
The present that she left to us.
